name: CULT (sammo_4gun)
description:
A WIP proof-of-concept game. Updated weekly.

CULT will be a top-down resource management strategy game, where you will use supernatural powers to influence the inhabitants of a small medieval town to form a glorious cult in your name. A procedurally generated town will form a careful balance of social networks and productivity, where each member of the community pulls their weight and has a distinct personality for you to take advantage of.

So far, the game doesn't have too much going - but already, the randomly generated inhabitants of your little town will be moving about, spending most of their day working their farms, chopping wood, or simply chatting to their neighbors!

If you do take the time to download and play this, please feel free to comment any thoughts you might have on the game so far - I will be trying to regularly update this post with conceptual work or actual updates to the game! I'm hoping that over time, this can serve as a proof of concept for the game of CULT to take off! Thank you for reading this :)
